name: acceleration
description: The rate at which the character accelerates at the beginning of a sprint.

name: speed
description: The rate at which the character responds to things and moves.

name: springiness
description: The upthrow a character can reach in combination with the character height.

name: homeliness
description: How attractive a person is. This may be obscured by clothing, make up, dirt ...

name: health
description: The body's natural capacity to heal and cope with disease

name: reflex
description: Speed in responding to an unpredictable physical situation

name: stamnia
description: A measure of the body's endurance and fitness.

name: intelligence
description: The ability to reason things through in a logical fashion.

name: intuition
description: The capacity to jump to conclusions with insufficient information.

name: health
description: The general mental health and ability to cope with stress.

name: wisdom
description: The ability to take into account how other circumstances will affects things and determine the safest course of action.
